svg.title: Additive animation of text y and y
svg.desc:
Two from-to animations are added with additive sum for x and y of text. The visible result for an additive behaviour is that the blue 'text' (with all glyphs at the same position) covers exactly the red 'text' without any visible animation effect. If the blue text moves somehow and the red gets visible, the animation is not additive as indicated in grey.
Behaviour of different viewers:
Amaya 9.51: additive behaviour seems not to be implemented yet for any attribute or property; only the first list item used for animation; red text vanishes for whatever reason ;o) KSVG1 (KDE, Konqueror plugin): no animation here Adobe plugin (3.01 Beta Release 1, Build 88): shows additive behaviour Squiggle 1.7: shows additive behaviour Opera 8.x: no animation here and some more nonsense Opera9tp1/2/beta1/2: different nonsense, only the first list item used for animation, for this not additive behaviour Opera9.00/9.10: wrong timing, something like not additive behaviour Opera9.50 alpha/beta: not additive behaviour
